title: SOLD: 1879-80 NY Clipper Woodcut - Tim Murnane HOF (BGS Authentic)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1879-80 NY Clipper Woodcut - Tim Murnane HOF (BGS Authentic)
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is an extremely rare 1879-80 New York Clipper Woodcut picturing HOF Journalist, Tim Murnane, who was also a player for the Philadelphia Athletics in the early 1870's, having played alongside Cap Anson for a couple of years. This beauty has been authenticated and encapsulated by Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scan of the item for condition details as this piece was meticulously removed from a full issue of the New York Clipper newspaper. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]

posts.post_title: PRICE REDUCED: 1879-80 NY Clipper Woodcut - Tim Murnane HOF (BGS Authentic)
